1.0.name: wordpress/yahoo-weather-plugin
1.0.description:
Put your city weather in post/page or widget. Easy to customize and support multi-widget. Enhanced Weather Icons and output.

Options

  • 1.Admin Panel
  • 2.Temperature Options
  • 3.Easly customizable Stylesheet.

Credits

  • 1.Yahoo Weather.
  • 2.Weather Location Codes/IDs.
